full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) for Software as a Service (SaaS)

#### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: WS4125166145
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4125166145
* **Publication Date**: October 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 30, 2028, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Number**: 4

#### Tender Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) to establish a new method of supply for various Software as a Service (SaaS) requirements. Resulting supply arrangements will facilitate the procurement process and are non-binding agreements between Canada and suppliers. Supplies arranged through this RFSA may result in contracts, but a contract will only exist if and when a contract is awarded.

#### Scope of Work
The RFSA seeks to establish a method of supply for SaaS solutions that meet the needs of the Government of Canada (GC).

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

#### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17716403?extsite=MTc3MTY0MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Contact Information
* Alastair Webb, Contracting Officer
	+ Email: alastair.webb@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Important Notes
* Annexes, if any, will be available on the tender website.
* Offers must be submitted to the generic SaaS RFSA email inbox: TPSGC.LENQS-SAAS.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contract award will be based on supplier capabilities and capacity.
* Suppliers must ensure they are able to meet the requirements and needs of the GC.

Note: Deadline and tender closing information is subject to change. Please check the official notice website for the most up-to-date information.  [Tender Announcement]([official annoucement URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17716403?extsite=MTc3MTY0MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)). [Contact Information](#contact-information)
